graphicslib3D
Class Polygon3D

java.lang.Object
  graphicslib3D.Polygon3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Polygon3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

Defines a 3D polygon which includes a Vertex list and Plane Coefficients. The VertexList of a Polygon3D is made up of Vertex3D objects representing the polygon vertices. The plane coefficients of the polygon are stored as doubles, and can be set and retrieved individually or by using the XYZW components of a Point3D object.

Author:
John Clevenger, based on an earlier version by William Dimaculangan, and extended by Monika Jankun
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
Polygon3D()
          Creates a polygon with an empty vertex list and plane coefficients whose values are all zero.

Method Detail

clone

public java.lang.Object clone()
Returns an Object which is a deep clone of this Polygon3D.

Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object

getVertices

public java.util.Vector getVertices()
Returns a reference to the Vector holding the vertex list of this polygon. Note that what is returned is a reference to the actual vertex list Vector, not a copy of the vertex list. Therefore, any changes made to the returned Vector contents causes a corresponding change in the polygon vertex list.

setNewVertexList

public void setNewVertexList(java.util.Vector newVertexList)
Saves the specified Vector as the new vertex list of this polygon. The old vertex list is discarded.

getPlaneCoefficients

public mathlib3D.Point3D getPlaneCoefficients()
Returns a new Point3D object whose XYZW values are the same as the ABCD plane coefficient values of this polygon.

setPlaneCoefficients

public void setPlaneCoefficients(mathlib3D.Point3D newCoeffs)
Sets new values for the plane coefficients of this polygon. The new plane coefficient values ABCD are taken from the XYZW components of the specified Point3D object.

addVertex

public void addVertex(mathlib3D.Vertex3D newVertex)
Creates a copy of the specified Vertex3D object and adds the new Vertex3D to the tail of the vertex list of this Polygon3D.

addVertex

public void addVertex(mathlib3D.Point3D aPoint3D)
Uses the specified Point3D to create a new Vertex3D object and adds the Vertex3D to the vertex list of this Polygon3D. The new Vertex3D is created by passing the input Point3D to the constructor Vertex3D(Point3D). The new Vertex3D is added to the Polygon3D vertex list by invoking the method addVertex(Vertex3D), meaning the vertex is added to the tail of the vertex list.

insertVertex

public void insertVertex(mathlib3D.Vertex3D newVertex)
Creates a copy of the specified Vertex3D object and inserts the new Vertex3D at the head of the vertex list of this Polygon3D.

insertVertex

public void insertVertex(mathlib3D.Point3D aPoint3D)
Uses the specified Point3D to create a new Vertex3D object and inserts the Vertex3D at the head of the vertex list of this Polygon3D. The new Vertex3D is created by passing the input Point3D to the constructor Vertex3D(Point3D). The new Vertex3D is added to the Polygon3D vertex list by invoking the method insertVertex(Vertex3D), meaning the vertex is added to the head of the vertex list.

setColor

public void setColor(java.awt.Color c)
Changes the Color RGB member of each of the Vertex3D objects in this polygon's vertexList. If the vertex list is null or empty, the method silently takes no action.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a printable representation of this Polygon.
